title: Strange LP loss/win
body:
I don't complain but I'm curious, and if someone can tell me why I would be thankful please no hate or mean comments.
I have won, maybe 14 games in a roll, every time winning 15-19max LP, but when i lost it took me 27 and the next 25, I have good winrate and i could say for myself that i play well, (if its because of losses or bad plays). If someone can explain this to me ??

replies.body:
Hey 2much2handle, 

When it comes to LP gain and loss it all comes down to your MMR. They have a ranked faq that can give you exact details on it and I'm going to post it down below so can read up on it :) Hope this helps! 

Ranked Faq: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ#h2q4
